subject: Re: [junit] ActiveTestSuite with JUnit 4.x
msgSnippet: Michael, I m not aware of one.  It should be doable, and much easier once the runner extension architecture is refactored.  Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Michael,

I'm not aware of one. It should be doable, and much easier once the
runner extension architecture is refactored. Thanks,

David Saff
